page.title: 16Houghton-Education
page.content: The L.E.A. is Sunderland metropolitan borough council.There is a total of 13 schools comprising of 1 nursery,7 primary,3 comprehensive and 2 special schools Houghton Junior school is a split site with 2 temporary classrooms across the road.It also has a lack of playing fields & pupils use the sports complex.St.Michael's R.C. primary school is designated as being in a social priority area.Secondary education is provided in two 11-16 comprehensive schools & one 11-18. There are no F.E. Establishments in the area and students must travel to Sunderland.The L.E.A. does however, provide a variety of non-vacational evening classes in the area.
